channel.title: Comments on: John Edwards Energy Policy – Looks like he stole it from President Bill Richardson

item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description: thanks for posting OK. I was actually trying to be funny and failed in your eyes. sorry. i was also alluding to the fact that Richardson was Secretary of Energy and has been working on his energy policies publically for a lot longer than the rest of the pack. hope you continue to comment I have 4 democratic candidates down and 4 more to go...what ever shall i do with the republicans.
item.content:encoded: thanks for posting OK. I was actually trying to be funny and failed in your eyes. sorry. i was also alluding to the fact that Richardson was Secretary of Energy and has been working on his energy policies publically for a lot longer than the rest of the pack. hope you continue to comment I have 4 democratic candidates down and 4 more to go…what ever shall i do with the republicans.

item.title: By: okamichan13
item.dc:creator: okamichan13
item.description: Its hard to see how Edwards stole from Richardson since Edwards released his plan before Richrdson did.
item.content:encoded: Its hard to see how Edwards stole from Richardson since Edwards released his plan before Richrdson did.
